item.description:
Please join us for a special evening of Photoshop and Lightroom demonstrations with Mark Maguire and Dave Owczarek of Adobe Systems.

Mark Maguire is a senior software engineer working on the Photoshop team. He is a graduate of the University of Massachusetts and has been working in computer graphics for over 15 years.  He will demonstrate a variety of Photoshop retouching techniques including layering and masking. Other topics covered include: Refine Edge, Content Aware Fill, 3D, and Vanishing Point.

Dave Owczarek is a senior systems engineer  and is a graduate of the  George Washington University School of Engineering and Applied Science.  Dave will demonstrate Lightroom techniques from beginner to advanced.

Be ready to ask your toughest questions to these guys.

 

Note: This meeting will take place at Adobe Systems, 21 Hickory Drive, Waltham, MA

Directions: http://www.adobe.com/aboutadobe/contact/waltham_directions.pdf

--------------------------------------------------------------

For this meeting, we must provide Adobe with an attendance list in advance.  Your name must be on the list for admittance. Building security will NOT allow unregistered visitors.  Guests must register through this Meetup Group's system also.

Payment in advance is required to be added to the attendance list.. We're collecting meeting fees in advance to facilitate logistics.

Sorry no refunds if you cancel after November 24 (Thanksgiving Day).
item.name: An evening with Adobe Photoshop & Lightroom Specialists
